events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product does not match the listing at all.
The system identified the issue as related to a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. from the refunds department for further handling.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and photos of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached images showing the item I got, which is clearly different from what was advertised.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. You do not need to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for handling this quickly. I appreciate that I don’t have to send the wrong product back. Looking forward to the refund.
The refund case is now resolved and processed. You should see the amount credited within the expected timeframe.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund successfully. Please let us know if there is anything else we can help with.
As there has been no further response, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience. Your feedback is very valuable to us.
